textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: This rocky reef is inhabited by prickly Puffer Fish. These\n innocent looking fish can inflate like balloons to protect\n themselves.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
PUFFER FISH:
 Don't try to eat an inflated Puffer Fish, no
 matter how big you are. If you do, you'll
 bounce and lose some points. Try to be patient!
